se.lu.nateko.edca

Class LayerViewer

  • java.lang.Object
    • ListActivity
      • se.lu.nateko.edca.LayerViewer

  • public class LayerViewer
extends ListActivity
    COPYRIGHT*********************************** This file is part of the Emergency Data Collector for Android™ (EDCA). * Copyright © 2013 Mattias Spångmyr. * * LICENSE************************************ EDCA is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify it under * the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by the Free * Software Foundation, either version 3 of the License, or (at your * option) any later version. * * EDCA is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT ANY * WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or * FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the GNU General Public License * for more details. * * You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License along * with EDCA. If not, see "http://www.gnu.org/licenses/". * * The latest source for this software can be accessed at * "github.org/mattiassp/edca". * * EDCA also utilizes the JTS Topology Suite, Version 1.8 by Vivid * Solutions Inc. It is released under the Lesser General Public License * ("http://www.gnu.org/licenses/") and its source can be accessed at the * JTS Topology Suite website ("http://www.vividsolutions.com/jts"). * * Android™ is a trademark of Google Inc. The Android source is released * under the Apache License 2.0 * ("http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0") and can be accessed at * "http://source.android.com/". * * For other enquiries, e-mail to: edca.contact@gmail.com * * An Activity class that displays the layers available on the geospatial * server, connected to with the active ServerConnection. Using a Context * Menu, the user can specify which layers to display, which one to collect * data for and which ones to store locally. * *
    Version:
    0.57, 2013-07-22 * *
    Author:
    Mattias Spångmyr *

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static int COLOR_LAYER_BRIGHTNESS
      Constant defining the brightness of the colors used to show layer status (1-255).
      private static int CONTEXT_ACTIVATE_ID
      Constant defining the Context Menu position of the "Toggle Target for Upload" button.
      private static int CONTEXT_DISPLAY_ID
      Constant defining the Context Menu position of the "Toggle Display" button.
      private static int CONTEXT_STORE_ID
      Constant defining the Context Menu position of the "Toggle Store Locally" button.
      private BackboneSvc mService
      A reference to the application's background Service, received through the IBinder passed to the ServiceConnection after the Activity has bound to the Service.
      private ServiceConnection mServiceConnection
      Defines the callback for Service binding, passed to bindService().
      static java.lang.String TAG
      The error tag for this Activity.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void activateLayer(java.lang.Long rowId)
      Toggle activation of the selected layer, but first checks the activation state of any currently active layer to determine which operation to execute.
      protected void onBound()
      Continuation of the create/resume process, called from onServiceConnected after having bound to the Service.
      void onClickContextActivate(java.lang.Long rowId)
      Called from onContextItemSelected, activates or deactivates the selected layer.
      void onClickContextDisplay(java.lang.Long rowId)
      Called from onContextItemSelected, selects the clicked layer for being included in a GetMap request.
      void onClickContextStore(java.lang.Long rowId)
      Called from onContextItemSelected, stores the active layer on the device's external storage.
      void onClickUpload(View view)
      onClick callback method called when the Upload button is clicked.
      boolean onContextItemSelected(MenuItem item) 
      protected void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState) 
      void onCreateContextMenu(ContextMenu menu, View v, ContextMenuInfo menuInfo) 
      protected void onListItemClick(ListView l, View v, int position, long id) 
      protected void onPause() 
      protected void onResume() 
      void populateLayerList()
      Display all available layers from the active database connection, stored in the local SQLite database.
      void setLayout_ActiveLayer(GeographyLayer layer)
      A method which will display the name of the currently active local layer in red color.
      void setLayout_EnableUploadButton(boolean enable)
      Enables or disables the Upload button and sets its text.
      void setLayout_ListItems()
      A method that iterates through the items in the list and sets its color based on which mode is recorded in the local SQLite database.

                       View v,

      • onContextItemSelected

        public boolean onContextItemSelected(MenuItem item)

      • onClickUpload

        public void onClickUpload(View view)
        onClick callback method called when the Upload button is clicked.
        Parameters:
        view - The view of the Upload button.

      • onClickContextDisplay

        public void onClickContextDisplay(java.lang.Long rowId)
        Called from onContextItemSelected, selects the clicked layer for being included in a GetMap request.
        Parameters:
        rowId - The id of the layer selected from the list.

      • onClickContextActivate

        public void onClickContextActivate(java.lang.Long rowId)
        Called from onContextItemSelected, activates or deactivates the selected layer. Activation performs a DescribeFeature request to the geospatial server to acquire the information needed.
        Parameters:
        rowId - The id of the layer selected from the list.

      • activateLayer

        private void activateLayer(java.lang.Long rowId)
        Toggle activation of the selected layer, but first checks the activation state of any currently active layer to determine which operation to execute.

      • onClickContextStore

        public void onClickContextStore(java.lang.Long rowId)
        Called from onContextItemSelected, stores the active layer on the device's external storage.
        Parameters:
        rowId - The id of the layer selected from the list.

      • populateLayerList

        public void populateLayerList()
        Display all available layers from the active database connection, stored in the local SQLite database. It will also show the selected local layer if any.

      • setLayout_ListItems

        public void setLayout_ListItems()
        A method that iterates through the items in the list and sets its color based on which mode is recorded in the local SQLite database.

      • setLayout_ActiveLayer

        public void setLayout_ActiveLayer(GeographyLayer layer)
        A method which will display the name of the currently active local layer in red color. Sending null will clear the text, showing in grey color that there is no active layer.

      • setLayout_EnableUploadButton

        public void setLayout_EnableUploadButton(boolean enable)
        Enables or disables the Upload button and sets its text.
        Parameters:
        enable - True to enable.
